department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 本書報討論希望藉由學生分享各自專題或所讀文章，學習和練習邏輯思考、組織和報告能力。藉由在群體內分享，訓練學生的溝通及領導技巧。以英文報告及討論，讓學生面對現今或未來國際研討會上的挑戰更熟練。
goal.en: This course aims to help students develop skills in logical thinking, organization and presentation. Through sharing their own research project or studied literature and leading discussions, students practice communication and leadership skills. Presenting in English familiarize the students with the future encounters at international meetings.
